name: Shine's Adventures 4 (Nightmare)
description:
The following is the link to the bundle of"Shine's Adventures".The bundle will give you more discounts.
https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/12728/Shines_Adventures/
(If you don't see the bundle or can't open the link, you can copy the link manually)

This is a Roguelike game.There are also some arpg contents.

1 Shine will seek in the maze and kill the demons that destroy the world.

2 The maze is random. There are 20 different rooms in the game, more than 100 props and 10 boss.

3 As an action game, difficulty and flexibility are moderate.

4 Although the maze is random, there are certain rules that will bring about some tactics.

5 After killing the boss, you can still continue the game and get better equipment and get higher scores.
